LanguageData.FM.Mining.CheckRoomDivision.Tip: Managers will try to prevent breaching walls that divide rooms, or that would create shortcuts.
LanguageData.FM.Mining.SyncFilterAndAllowed.Tip: Enabling this will try to synchronize the counted materials in the threshold filter with the rocks and buildings allowed for mining/deconstruction, and vice versa.
